AD_VER = #{adVer,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update BULLET_ADS set AD_NAME = #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AD_ADDR = #{adAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AD_LINK = #{adLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ALL_CITY = #{isAllCity,jdbcType=BIT}, SEQ_NO = #{seqNo,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AD_STATUS = #{adStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, AD_TYPE = #{adType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AD_VER = #{adVer,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AD_ID = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
